Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to produce event log integrating tables. Steps: Identify cases = order_id. Derive activities: Order Created, Item Picked (maybe per line), Order Dispatched (per delivery), Order Arrived (per delivery), Invoice Issued (per invoice), Payment Received (per payment). Also could include Order Delivered maybe combine dispatch+arrival as separate events. Resource column: map sales_person_id for order created, picker_id for picking, carrier_id for dispatch/arrival? For arrival maybe same carrier. Billing person for invoice, payment method maybe resource? Use resource table to map names.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to output markdown table with columns: Case ID, Activity, Timestamp, Resource, Other Attributes (maybe order_priority, item_id, quantity, delivery_note, invoice_amount, payment_method, etc). Provide one row per event.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to handle multiple items: could create separate events per item picking. That is fine. Multiple deliveries: each delivery has dispatch and arrival events. Multiple invoices and payments: each invoice event and each payment event.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Assumptions: If multiple items picking same order, separate events. If multiple deliveries, each dispatch/arrival separate.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now construct data. First, parse each order. Order 1001: Order Created: 2024-01-01T09:00:00Z, resource = sales person SP-001 -> Alice Brown. Items: ITEM-001 picked 2024-01-02T10:15:00Z, picker WH-001 -> David Lin, quantity 2. ITEM-002 picked 2024-01-02T11:00:00Z, picker WH-002 -> Eva Johnson, quantity 1. Delivery: DLV-5001 dispatch 2024-01-03T08:30:00Z, carrier CR-01 -> GlobalTransport, note Normal route. Arrival 2024-01-05T14:45:00Z. Invoice: INV-1001 issued 2024-01-06T09:00:00Z, amount 250, billing BL-001 -> Gina Carter. Payment: PAY-2001 2024-01-10T11:30:00Z, method Credit Card, reference REF-CC-123. Order 1002: Created: 2024-01-02T12:30:00Z, sales SP-002 -> Bob Smith. Items: ITEM-003 picked 2024-01-03T09:45:00Z, picker WH-002 (Eva Johnson), qty4. ITEM-005 picked 2024-01-03T10:00:00Z, picker WH-001 (David Lin), qty2. Deliveries: DLV-5002 dispatch 2024-01-04T07:20:00Z, carrier CR-02 (FastShip), note Requires signature. Arrival 2024-01-07T16:10:00Z. DLV-5003 dispatch 2024-01-05T07:00:00Z, carrier CR-01 (GlobalTransport), note Partial backorder. Arrival 2024-01-08T10:00:00Z. Invoices: INV-1002 issued 2024-01-08T10:15:00Z, amount 400, billing BL-002 (Harry Lee). INV-1003 issued 2024-01-10T11:00:00Z, amount 100, billing BL-002. Payments: PAY-2002 2024-01-12T14:00:00Z, method Wire Transfer, ref REF-WT-XYZ. PAY-2003 2024-01-15T09:00:00Z, method Check, ref REF-CH-789.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Order 1003: No payment listed? Not in payments table. So assume missing. Order 1004: No delivery record for 1004 in table. So assume none. Invoice: none. Payment: none.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Now produce event log rows. Case 1001: 1. Order Created - 2024-01-01T09:00:00Z - Resource: Alice Brown (sales) - order_priority High, customer_id CUST-ABC, customer_type Retail. 2. Item Picked - ITEM-001 - 2024-01-02T10:15:00Z - Resource: David Lin - quantity 2. 3. Item Picked - ITEM-002 - 2024-01-02T11:00:00Z - Resource: Eva Johnson - quantity 1. 4. Order Dispatched - 2024-01-03T08:30:00Z - Resource: GlobalTransport - delivery_note Normal route, delivery_id DLV-5001. 5. Order Arrived - 2024-01-05T14:45:00Z - Resource: GlobalTransport - delivery_id DLV-5001. 6. Invoice Issued - INV-1001 - 2024-01-06T09:00:00Z - Resource: Gina Carter - amount 250. 7. Payment Received - PAY-2001 - 2024-01-10T11:30:00Z - Resource: Credit Card (method) maybe resource column as Credit Card. Include payment_reference.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: For payment method, we could put method as resource column (or attribute). We will put method in Attributes, and maybe resource column as Payment System but better to keep resource column blank for payments, and include method in attributes.
